divs: sighting detailsi was taking some sky pictures at 10:00am this morning (03\06\2006) and got these two pictures with the same objects in them. i took twelve shots and these were the only two with any objects in them. the second picture (the one with the objects behind a tree branch) was taken less than a minute after the first one was taken. the camera was pointed in an easterly direction and the objects were moving in nw direction. in the past six months i have captured objects of this kind and also white round ones and also white mixed with other colors. with the enlargements there are a total of four pictures. if i am unable to post all four i will make another report with the other photo in it.
trends: There have been 96 other sightings in Wilmington

This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Four to five objects above my yard
